Title: Directs superintendent of financial services to establish a separate classification for liability insurance for installers of wind or solar electric generating systems
Summary: Directs superintendent of financial services to establish a separate classification for setting rates for liability insurance for installers of wind or solar electric generating systems; provides for a premium reduction to those installers which have no or minimal insurance claims.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to directing the superintendent of financial services to establish a separate classification for liability insurance for businesses engaged in the installation of wind or solar electric generating systems
